element.name: Luckbringer
element.supports: ID_INTERNAL_WEAPON_CATEGORY_SIMPLE_MELEE, ID_INTERNAL_DAMAGE_TYPE_PIERCING, ID_INTERNAL_WEAPON_PROPERTY_LIGHT, ID_INTERNAL_WEAPON_PROPERTY_FINESSE, ID_INTERNAL_WEAPON_PROPERTY_THROWN, ID_INTERNAL_WEAPON_PROPERTY_VERSATILE

description.p: This large starknife looks as if it has been repaired dozens of times by diffrent craftsmen using diffrent materials. When attuned to a Paladin of Desna who has the Lucky feat, increase the Luck pool by an amount equal to the wielders Charisma modifier.
Due to the Luckbringer's size, it can be wielded in two hands.
This magic weapon grants a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it, and it returns to the wielderâ€™s hand immediately after it is used to make a ranged attack.

Luckbringer can absorb materials of other weapons, this gives the other weapon the broken condition and heals Starsword for 1d4 (for a medium one-handed weapon) HP, this scales with size and weapon type. This process takes 10 minutes.
Because Luckbringer contains fragments of most metals, it ignores Resistance to any type of metal.
